long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ball bouncer is a fast-paced and exciting arcade game that challenges your reflexes and precision! Colorful balls fall randomly from the top of the screen, and your mission is to keep them bouncing while racking up points.

How to Play?

1) Control a horizontal strip board at the bottom by moving your mouse left and right.

2) Hit the falling balls with the board to bounce them back up and score points.

3) When a ball reaches the top, it bounces back down. Missed balls will disappear off the bottom.

4) As your score increases, more balls will appear, ramping up the challenge.

5) You have 30 seconds, with the timer displayed at the top left corner.

6) The current score is shown in the top middle, while the historical highest score is displayed at the top right. If your current score surpasses the high score, it will be updated.

Strategy: 

- Stay focused and move the board swiftly to keep up with the increasing number of balls.

Have fun and challenge yourself to beat your high score! After the game ends, we'll highlight some of our featured products, offering you even more fun options to explore!
